item.title: 16AOUT complex
item.description: 16 AOUT Complex is A Salon, not a shop. Its because of not only selling, but also it makes the customers to have fun and pleased by the products which dont stay only in fashion, also Class and New, and full of ideas and intelligence of Keiko Ikeda who has been involving in fashion for last 20 years.

item.title: Slanted Magazine #18 Signage / Orientation
item.description: Slanted #18 Signage / Orientation focuses on the ups and downs, the lefts and rights, the stops and go's, the Kiss+Ride and many more. Featured are many extraordinary wayfinding and orientation systems with different levels of complexity and relevant Typefaces.
item.content:encoded: Slanted #18 Signage / Orientation focuses on the ups and downs, the lefts and rights, the stops and go's, the Kiss+Ride and many more. Featured are many extraordinary wayfinding and orientation systems with different levels of complexity and relevant Typefaces.

item.title: Labbler Music Community Interface
item.description: Corporate-, User Experience- and Interface Design for the start up Labbler. Labbler is a music business community connecting Artists, Labels, Venues, Booking Agencies, Promoters and Fans. With Labbler you can create multiple pages for one account e.g. pages of your Artists, Label and Booking agency. You can upload, search and share Artists, Music, Charts, Photos, Events, News and more. And there are many other features about to launch.
item.content:encoded: Corporate-, User Experience- and Interface Design for the start up Labbler. Labbler is a music business community connecting Artists, Labels, Venues, Booking Agencies, Promoters and Fans. With Labbler you can create multiple pages for one account e.g. pages of your Artists, Label and Booking agency. You can upload, search and share Artists, Music, Charts, Photos, Events, News and more. And there are many other features about to launch.

item.title: CELEBRITIES
item.description: A series of images I have made with famous portrait photographer Paul Mobley. I am working with Paul on his "Celebrities" Book project in which he is shooting celebrities backstage before concerts, in their homes and at hotels while they are on the road. Paul and I brainstorm before each session and try to come up with ideas that best portray their personalities and artistic style. Wether it's subtle color and tone corrections or full out CGi and difficult composites, we do whatever it takes to make a captivating image.
item.content:encoded: A series of images I have made with famous portrait photographer Paul Mobley. I am working with Paul on his "Celebrities" Book project in which he is shooting celebrities backstage before concerts, in their homes and at hotels while they are on the road. Paul and I brainstorm before each session and try to come up with ideas that best portray their personalities and artistic style. Wether it's subtle color and tone corrections or full out CGi and difficult composites, we do whatever it takes to make a captivating image.

item.title: ? Tilt City colored pencil, paper 100 x 190cm
item.description: The staircase represents time, as everything happens in time. Although the trees grow in the mountains, their roots extend into the soil for life-sustaining nutrition. The vine of roots supports the life of the whole mountain. The buildings on the mountain are the result of world civilization, which is inseparable from nature. The world rests on the trees that is how the Chinese character?is made. This character originally means family genealogy, which takes its shape over time and through the passing down of tradition. The winding roots make the life of gigantic trees possible, and it is through the nutrition of nature that civilization is born and continued, so as to enable our world to move on in tides of time.
item.content:encoded: The staircase represents time, as everything happens in time. Although the trees grow in the mountains, their roots extend into the soil for life-sustaining nutrition. The vine of roots supports the life of the whole mountain. The buildings on the mountain are the result of world civilization, which is inseparable from nature. The world rests on the trees that is how the Chinese character?is made. This character originally means family genealogy, which takes its shape over time and through the passing down of tradition. The winding roots make the life of gigantic trees possible, and it is through the nutrition of nature that civilization is born and continued, so as to enable our world to move on in tides of time.

item.title: Type Navigator
item.description: The rapidly expanding online market for digital typefaces is exciting and diverse. With new fonts and type foundries launching on an almost daily basis, it has been difficult to keep track of notable developments. Type Navigator wants to be an useful current handbook of modern fonts, independent foundries, and innovative type designers that provides an overview of todays vast market. This comprehensive publication offers an overview of international sources for quality fonts. In addition to concise profiles of type foundries and recent typefaces, Type Navigator features inspirational visual examples of fonts in use. A free digital collection of 100 typeface variations from 20 choice foundries accompanies the 320-page book. Cover The typeface we used for the book is Times Lt Std, a Times version with medieval numbers. We have been asked why the hell Times and why for gods sake in red. No, not just to offend the type design world. As well because it was a way for us to seperate our design from the design of the foundries. Using a font that most people have on their computers, that they are seeing every day, that does not surprise them anymore, helped to make our design "invisible". Client: Gestalten Verlag Year: 2011
item.content:encoded: The rapidly expanding online market for digital typefaces is exciting and diverse. With new fonts and type foundries launching on an almost daily basis, it has been difficult to keep track of notable developments. Type Navigator wants to be an useful current handbook of modern fonts, independent foundries, and innovative type designers that provides an overview of todays vast market. This comprehensive publication offers an overview of international sources for quality fonts. In addition to concise profiles of type foundries and recent typefaces, Type Navigator features inspirational visual examples of fonts in use. A free digital collection of 100 typeface variations from 20 choice foundries accompanies the 320-page book. Cover The typeface we used for the book is Times Lt Std, a Times version with medieval numbers. We have been asked why the hell Times and why for gods sake in red. No, not just to offend the type design world. As well because it was a way for us to seperate our design from the design of the foundries. Using a font that most people have on their computers, that they are seeing every day, that does not surprise them anymore, helped to make our design "invisible". Client: Gestalten Verlag Year: 2011

item.title: Skateboarding is a Crime
item.description: "Skateboarding is a Crime" is an exhibition of illustrations by Gerhard Human in collaboration with Woodies Ramps. 12 unique illustrations will be for sale at a ridiculously low price. Hand printed in edition of 30, numbered and signed. ALL PROCEEDS will go to the development of skateparks in South Africa.
item.content:encoded: "Skateboarding is a Crime" is an exhibition of illustrations by Gerhard Human in collaboration with Woodies Ramps. 12 unique illustrations will be for sale at a ridiculously low price. Hand printed in edition of 30, numbered and signed. ALL PROCEEDS will go to the development of skateparks in South Africa.

item.title: The Beatles: Rock Band Cinematic - Character Design
item.description: In collaboration between Shy the Sun and Pete Candeland, we were commissioned to design and conceptualize the characters of the second part of the Beatles Rock Band Cinematic. Shy the Sun was given complete freedom in the development of the marching band, have a look at our original character designs before they were modeled in 3D. PS. most of these characters were designed on a boat cruise in the Bahamas whilst drinking tall cocktails.
item.content:encoded: In collaboration between Shy the Sun and Pete Candeland, we were commissioned to design and conceptualize the characters of the second part of the Beatles Rock Band Cinematic. Shy the Sun was given complete freedom in the development of the marching band, have a look at our original character designs before they were modeled in 3D. PS. most of these characters were designed on a boat cruise in the Bahamas whilst drinking tall cocktails.

item.title: Chef's Mask II
item.description: This year marks the 30th birthday of the gastronomic restaurant Au Bon Gîte. The Chief has prepared special bimonthly menus to showcase unique offerings to celebrate throughout the year. Composed in harmony, as the expert layering of flavors, the elements of each mask will reveal the personality of the Chief's menu. Chef's Mask II represents the various ingredients used to cook the second menu : turnips, poultry, morels, crayfish, lemons, oranges, chocolate . Each poster will be integrated into postcards, menus, loyalty cards and flyers. Our design concept is based on the phrase "Tell me what you eat, I'll tell you who you are" and the work of Arcimboldo. This is a work in progress.
item.content:encoded: This year marks the 30th birthday of the gastronomic restaurant Au Bon Gîte. The Chief has prepared special bimonthly menus to showcase unique offerings to celebrate throughout the year. Composed in harmony, as the expert layering of flavors, the elements of each mask will reveal the personality of the Chief's menu. Chef's Mask II represents the various ingredients used to cook the second menu : turnips, poultry, morels, crayfish, lemons, oranges, chocolate . Each poster will be integrated into postcards, menus, loyalty cards and flyers. Our design concept is based on the phrase "Tell me what you eat, I'll tell you who you are" and the work of Arcimboldo. This is a work in progress.
